title: T206 tougher backs, oddities and others for trade or sale

posts.post_title: T206 tougher backs, oddities and others for trade or sale
posts.post_content:

El Principe De Gales
Sweet Caporal 350-460 fact. 42
Sweet Caporal 350-460 fact. 42 overprint

Sovereign 150
Sweet Caporal fact. 25
Sweet Caporal fact. 30

If any of these interest you let me know and maybe we can work something out.
Thanks
Mike
[URL="mhgt@embarqmail.com"]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/URL]
